job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are seeking an experienced AI Engineer to join their team. You will be a part of an AI Engineering team focused on GenAI infrastructure and applications. This team is responsible for delivering on company's GenAI strategy by providing infrastructure for other teams to use and building zero to one point solutions for others to adopt in their applications. You are expected to use software engineering best practices adapted to a non-deterministic technology, Generative AI, which will require flexibility while maintaining high standards of reliability. While the goals are clear, how they get there can be ambiguous with emerging technologies requiring you to be creative in your problem solving.

   This role reports to the AI Engineering Manager within the Data organization. Data is centralized within the company and provides solutions for all of their applications and business to utilize.

   What you will do:
     * Architect and implement innovative GenAI based solutions.
     * Cultivate high standards for communication, ownership, and quality while executing asynchronously.
     * Work with a distributed engineering team across multiple time zones/countries.
     * Ensure tasks are transparent, organized, on schedule and expectations are managed.
     * Partner with other technical leaders to refine and deliver on their GenAI strategy.
     * Be a strong voice of clarity in a world of a growing startup, and help your colleagues function when faced with ambiguity.
     * Conduct and facilitate code reviews to maintain high code quality and adherence to standards.
     * Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry best practices, driving continuous improvement in development processes., * An independent engineer (not associated with an agency) with the ability to work approximately 40 hours per week, Monday-Friday.
     * Committed to being available until noon Pacific Time (not necessarily working but responsive on Slack and attending occasional meetings).
     * A camera and microphone are required for interviews and further team meetings/discussions.
     * Remote position, collaborating with a distributed team of engineers across the Americas and Eurasia.
     * Weekly wages.
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer

We are seeking an experienced AI Engineer to join their team. You will be a part of an AI Engineering team focused on GenAI infrastructure and applications. This team is responsible for delivering on company's GenAI strategy by providing infrastructure for other teams to use and building zero to one point solutions for others to adopt in their applications. You are expected to use software engineering best practices adapted to a non-deterministic technology, Generative AI, which will require flexibility while maintaining high standards of reliability. While the goals are clear, how they get there can be ambiguous with emerging technologies requiring you to be creative in your problem solving.

   This role reports to the AI Engineering Manager within the Data organization. Data is centralized within the company and provides solutions for all of their applications and business to utilize.

   What you will do:
     * Architect and implement innovative GenAI based solutions.
     * Cultivate high standards for communication, ownership, and quality while executing asynchronously.
     * Work with a distributed engineering team across multiple time zones/countries.
     * Ensure tasks are transparent, organized, on schedule and expectations are managed.
     * Partner with other technical leaders to refine and deliver on their GenAI strategy.
     * Be a strong voice of clarity in a world of a growing startup, and help your colleagues function when faced with ambiguity.
     * Conduct and facilitate code reviews to maintain high code quality and adherence to standards.
     * Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry best practices, driving continuous improvement in development processes., * An independent engineer (not associated with an agency) with the ability to work approximately 40 hours per week, Monday-Friday.
     * Committed to being available until noon Pacific Time (not necessarily working but responsive on Slack and attending occasional meetings).
     * A camera and microphone are required for interviews and further team meetings/discussions.
     * Remote position, collaborating with a distributed team of engineers across the Americas and Eurasia.
     * Weekly wages.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes 'GenAI infrastructure and applications', 'delivering on company's GenAI strategy', 'building zero to one point solutions', and 'architect and implement innovative GenAI based solutions'. These phrases directly align with the core responsibilities and definition of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and deploying generative AI solutions and the associated infrastructure.

job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'delivering on company's GenAI strategy', 'providing infrastructure for other teams to use', and 'partner with other technical leaders to refine and deliver on their GenAI strategy' indicate an understanding of business goals and how to align technical solutions with them.

The phrase 'building zero to one point solutions for others to adopt in their applications' shows an understanding of creating new solutions that meet business needs and can be integrated into existing applications.
job_tasks.phrase: building zero to one point solutions

job_tasks.justification: The core of the role is focused on 'GenAI infrastructure and applications' and 'architect and implement innovative GenAI based solutions', which directly relates to working with generative models.
The phrase 'architect and implement innovative GenAI based solutions' clearly points to the development and deployment of generative AI models and systems.
job_tasks.phrase: architect and implement innovative GenAI based solutions

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'use software engineering best practices adapted to a non-deterministic technology, Generative AI', 'building zero to one point solutions for others to adopt in their applications', and 'conduct and facilitate code reviews to maintain high code quality and adherence to standards', all of which are core software development activities.
The phrase 'building zero to one point solutions for others to adopt in their applications' implies the development of applications or features that integrate GenAI capabilities.
job_tasks.phrase: building zero to one point solutions

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'code reviews to maintain high code quality and adherence to standards' is a fundamental software development practice.

The focus on 'GenAI infrastructure' and 'delivering on company's GenAI strategy by providing infrastructure for other teams to use' suggests a need for robust deployment and maintenance of GenAI systems.

The requirement to 'ensure tasks are transparent, organized, on schedule and expectations are managed' and 'cultivate high standards for communication, ownership, and quality while executing asynchronously' points to operational management and best practices for production systems.
job_tasks.phrase: ensure tasks are transparent, organized, on schedule

job_tasks.justification: The need to adapt 'software engineering best practices' to 'Generative AI' and maintain 'high standards of reliability' implies operational considerations for production AI systems.
